#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{ int n,counter=0;
 char previous,next;
 cin>>n;
 if(n==1)
 {return 0;}
 
 else
 {
 cin>>previous>>next;
 
 if(previous==next)
 {counter++;}

 n=n-2;                
 while(n--)
 {
  previous=next;
  cin>>next;
         if(previous==next)
                  {counter++;}
 }

cout<<counter;

return 0;
}
}
